headline: What eBay (EBAY)'s Canada Livestream Shopping Expansion Means For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this week, eBay expanded its interactive livestream shopping platform, eBay Live, into Canada, combining real-time video, trusted sellers, and curated collectibles to let buyers ask questions and purchase instantly across mobile, desktop, and the app. This move highlights eBay’s push to modernize its marketplace with social-style shopping experiences, aiming to deepen engagement in high-interest categories like collectibles and fandom-related merchandise. Next, we’ll examine how eBay...
